summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account, detailing billing information, service usage, and payment history. It includes charges for various services, taxes, and credits, along with customer service contact information. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and call activity associated with an account, including dates, times, and durations of calls made to and from various locations. The records indicate numerous incoming calls primarily from Palm Beach, Florida, and include references to message retrievals and unlimited calling plans. This document contains detailed voice usage and text message records for an AT&T Wireless account associated with the Epstein case. It includes call logs, charges, and timestamps, indicating frequent communication primarily from Palm Beach, Florida. The document is significant as it may provide insights into the communication patterns of individuals involved in the case.
